cause.description:
THE PRISONS ARE OVER POPULATED AND THEIR IS NO REHABILITATION AND NO REAL SUPPORT FOR THE VICTIMS AND THERE FAMILIES. THE GOVERMENT IS FAILING TO MAKE PROGRAMS THAT HELP THE CRIMINALS CHANGE THERE WAYS. EACH DAY THE CRIMES ARE MORE HAYNOUS AGAINST CHILDREN, WOMEN AND ELDERLY PEOPLE AND IT IS TIME TO PUT A STOP TO THIS. SUPPORT THE DEATH PENALTY.
1. STOP THE KILLERS
cause.name: Law Enforcement Pro Death Penalty
